meanings.definition: The quality or state of being different or distinct.
meanings.sent1: The disparatenesses between the two paintings were evident in their color schemes.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the disparatenesses in the students' writing styles.
meanings.sent3: The disparatenesses in their fashion choices made them stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The disparatenesses in their personalities created a unique dynamic within the group.
meanings.sent5: The disparatenesses in their tastes led to interesting discussions during dinner.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unequal or dissimilar.
meanings.sent1: She noticed the disparatenesses in the sizes of the cupcakes.
meanings.sent2: The economic report highlighted the disparatenesses in income distribution.
meanings.sent3: The disparatenesses in their shoe sizes made finding a pair to borrow challenging.
meanings.sent4: The disparatenesses in their strengths and weaknesses complemented each other in the team.
meanings.sent5: The disparatenesses in their preferences for music added variety to the playlist.

meanings.definition: The existence of contrasting elements or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The novel's plot revealed the disparatenesses between the main characters.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the disparatenesses of light and shadow in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The disparatenesses in their approaches to problem-solving sparked interesting debates.
meanings.sent4: The music festival showcased the disparatenesses of different genres on one stage.
meanings.sent5: The landscape painting beautifully depicted the disparatenesses of nature.
